overview: The 2003 season promised to be great; it turned out to be one of the best for years! Classic on-track battles combined with off-track mind games, delivering an intensely competitive year of action and drama. Eight different drivers won Grands Prix, including three first timers. And it all went down to the last race for a thrilling climax. McLaren-Mercedes Kimi Raikkonen and Montoya (BMW Williams) were in contention right to the end, but could they hold off the mighty Schumacher in his Ferrari? This official review is two hours of non-stop entertainment from start to finish.
tagline: The Official Review of the 2003 FIA Formula One World Championship
title: F1 Review 2003
